sentences.en: He moved at a brisk pace down the rue St Antoine.
sentences.cn: 他沿着圣安托万街轻快地走去。

sentences.en: I wonder if Spurs ever rue what they let go!
sentences.cn: 我总是想,热刺是否会为了放弃他而后悔莫及.

sentences.en: If she did not obey her she would rue it.
It would be easy to look back and rue the wasted moments.
sentences.cn: 人们总是容易回忆过去,懊悔浪费的光阴.

sentences.en: Rue Guynemer begins at the front of the Fitzgerald site.
sentences.cn: 吉内梅街始于菲茨拉德故居前。

sentences.en: She learned to rue the day she had met Henri.
sentences.cn: 她开始后悔认识了亨利。

sentences.en: She signalled a passing taxi and ordered him to take her to the rue Marengo.
sentences.cn: 她招手打了一辆路过的出租车，让司机载她去马伦戈街。

sentences.en: Tell rue the truth, what is your relationship with him? "
sentences.cn: 老实说出来, 你跟他有什么关系? ”

sentences.en: To his rue, the error cost him the game.
sentences.cn: 让他后悔的是, 这个错误让他满盘皆输.

sentences.en: You look like the Rue de la Paix.
You may commit in a moment what you may rue for years -- what life cannot cancel.
sentences.cn: 一失足成千古恨 -- 永生永世也抹不掉.

sentences.en: You'll live to rue it, ie You will regret it one day.
You'll live to rue the day you said that to me, my girl.
sentences.cn: 总有一天你会后悔对我说了那些话的，小姐。

sentences.en: You'll live to rue the day you said that to me.
sentences.cn: 总有一天你会后悔对我说了那些话的。

sentences.en: You're going to rue this the longest day that you live.

trans.tran_en: to wish that you had not done something
